question.text: In the past 10 years have you received any treatment, medical advice or consultation for; been diagnosed by a member of the medical profession with or required follow-up for the following:

paragragh.text: - Alzheimer's, Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS, Lou Gehrig's Disease), Aneurysm
- Cancer(excluding basal cell or squamous cell carcinoma of the skin), Circulatory Disorder,
- Congestive Heart Failure (CHF), Cystic Fibrosis, Dementia or Mental Retardation (including Down's Syndrome)
- Leukemia, Lupus, Lymphoma, Malignant Neoplasm, Melanoma, Muscular Atrophy, Muscular Dystrophy, Multiple Sclerosis, Myasthenia Gravis
- Parkinson's Disease, Schleroderma, Schizophrenia, Tumor, any disease or disorder of the Liver
- Peripheral Vascular System, Systemantic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE)

question.text: Have you ever been diagnosed by a member of the medical profession as having Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome (AIDS) or AIDS Related Complex (ARC)?
Have you, within the past 5 years, been treated for, advised to Discontinue, Decrease or seek treatment for Drug or Alcohol Use?
Have you, within the past 5 years, been treated by a Physician for, or been diagnosed as having Gauchers Disease?
